Flying, menace
[i]In Extremis[/i] – As long as you have 20 or less life, creatures you control have “When this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and loses 3 life.”
[i]Pair up[/i] – Whenever Scarlet, Wyvern Lord attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw two cards.
